ai-patthana15.1:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-patthana15.1:2.1_0: Because it’s not good for the sake of a wholesome quality, and no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.1:2.1_1: Only brahmins don’t give rise to skillful qualities, or cause movement by cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.1:2.1_2: Because it’s not good for the sake of skillful or unskillful;
ai-patthana15.1:2.1_3: There is no production in the mind as object,
ai-patthana15.1:4.1_0: Or they can’t even find a vulnerability regarding the same reasons.
ai-patthana15.1:5.1_0: Not skilled in the reason for the teaching, not for the sake of nature, or condition.
ai-patthana15.1:6.1_0: ‘The cause and condition is not good for the sake of a wholesome quality, or for the object.’
ai-patthana15.1:7.1_0: Not for the sake of a wholesome quality, or for the sake of the profitable, or for the sake of the Dhamma,
ai-patthana15.1:8.1_0: roots and wholesome things don’t have the reason for the sake of the teaching, or for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.1:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana15.1:9.1_0: One person observes the nine projects oppressively next to each one, and three drops of the next lifetimes. When they’re reborn in a single moment, three opposite sex. Three faculties, three, four three, five faculties, three individuals, and three.
ai-patthana15.1:9.1_1: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.1:9.1_2: You should get close to a question.
ai-patthana15.1:10.1_0: Because it’s not cause or reason to give up a cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.1:11.1_0: Only go to an unwholesome teaching, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.1:12.1_0: Because it’s not possible to give up an unskillful quality, and no cause or reason to give rise to the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.1:12.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana15.1:12.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.1:13.1_0: Or they can’t even find a vulnerability regarding the same reasons.
ai-patthana15.1:14.1_0: (This is) skilled in the cause, not skilled in having causes and conditions for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.1:15.1_0: ‘This is a cause of unskillful qualities, not for the sake of the teaching, nor for the support of the mind.’
ai-patthana15.1:16.1_0: Not is skilled in teaching Dhamma, or conditioned by the cause of unskillful things, or by the means of the profitable way.
ai-patthana15.1:17.1_0: Unskillful cause and unskillful qualities, nor are those rooted in accordance with the Teaching, nor for the objection of the teaching.
ai-patthana15.1:17.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana15.1:18.1_0: One person observes the nine projects oppressively next to each one, and three drops of the next lifetimes. There are expanded in the three later limits, three faculties, three five powers, three uninterruptedly. one person ...
ai-patthana15.1:18.1_1: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.1:19.1_0: It’s not independent on the teaching, nor does the cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.1:19.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.1:19.1_3: You’re setting out of the dwellings ...
ai-patthana15.1:19.1_4: You should get close to a question.
